name: Dicey Dice Boy
description:
Land face up on the goal tile to complete each level!

  • WASD to move
  • 'R' to reset level
  • Beat the game to unlock level select menu (esc)

-- Paper Cat Team  --

     (alphabetical)

Fer-i - Art and Animation
